name: Gas Station Murder Case
description: This case revolves around a murder that transpired on September 3, 2011, within a gas station premises. The victim, who served as the station manager, was discovered deceased at his residence, with the cause of death attributed to excessive blood loss from stab wounds. The accused, Kudo (C0002), an employee of the gas station, faces charges for allegedly perpetrating the murder of the station manager at their shared workplace.
